channel.title: Snuff
channel.description:
There are so many topics about drugs so one will probably fit here.
Does anyone of you snuff?
I started using snuff when I "quitted" smoking (I still smoke sometimes but not really much). I find snuff much healthier and you can use it everywhere. And it doesn't make your clothes smell bad. :P
What snuff do you like? I usually use the ones that taste and smell like eucalyptus, and sometimes I use those which taste like licorice. Too bad it's illegal to sell snuff in Finland so it's hard to get sometimes. :(

item.title: Snuff
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

I’d have to go with cherry flavoured cigars. Never tried snuff and it looks kinda nasty. ^ They look like anchovies in the opend can…

Read full topic

item.title: Snuff
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Secet, post:4, topic:210512”][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=277376.msg2260894#msg2260894 date=1212697576]
Damn Secet, “snuff” aka nuuska is shittier than cigs, you should’ve kept smoking. I’ve tried chewing tobacco once and the experience sucked; it tasted bad and I couldn’t taste anything else for 10hrs straight from the use. Btw, where do you live in Finland? I know a couple places where you can get it.
[/quote]

Well I only use snuff for 3-4 days per week, I don’t use it at work. So it doesn’t ruin my gums. I live in Kuusankoski, next to Kouvola. I know also few places where I can get it but sometimes price is pretty high so…

[quote author=Mopman link=topic=277376.msg2260896#msg2260896 date=1212697638]
I didn’t mean the stuff that you put in nose, I meant snuff that you put under your lips. (Is snus correct word for it in english, dunno?)
Stuff like this:

Never tried it. For some reason it seems disgusting to me, which I can’t quite work out considering I’ve put worse up my nose.
[/quote][/quote]

Sorry to say , But that looks discusting.

Read full topic

item.title: Snuff
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:6, topic:210512”]Oh right, I see.

Haha, 100% safe? If you consider cancer safe, sure. (This dosen’t mean don’t do it, this means don’t do it with the delusion that it’s safe)[/quote]In a research they made in Sweden, only 5-10 people died from mouth cancer, and that not only being caused just by chewing tobacco but by regular use of alcohol, cigs etc. so chewing it won’t hurt you for the next 10-20 years.

Read full topic

I’ve tried chewing tobacco once and the experience sucked; it tasted bad and I couldn’t taste anything else for 10hrs straight from the use. Btw, where do you live in Finland? I know a couple places where you can get it.

Well I only use snuff for 3-4 days per week, I don’t use it at work. So it doesn’t ruin my gums. I live in Kuusankoski, next to Kouvola. I know also few places where I can get it but sometimes price is pretty high so…

[quote=“Mopman, post:3, topic:210512”]I didn’t mean the stuff that you put in nose, I meant snuff that you put under your lips. (Is snus correct word for it in english, dunno?)

Never tried it. For some reason it seems disgusting to me, which I can’t quite work out considering I’ve put worse up my nose.[/quote]
